nodes.text: Kyryll Pork Rinds were a type of snack that could be purchased at Ronto Roasters and at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY.

Kyryll Pork Rinds can be purchased in the real-world at the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. They have been sold at Ronto Roasters in Disneyland and at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Disney's Hollywood Studios.
